title: Rapier - Fork Branching based on Step Results

1.itemLabel: Execute the Test Script on Fork Branching
1.summary:
As we explored in the last section, it may be useful to BRANCH a script based on the PASS / FAIL status of the script.

Alternate Script Blocks such as OnScriptSuccess and OnScriptFailure will execute one of more steps.

But wouldn't it be useful to be able to FORK the execution of a script based on tests of the any values within the Data Pipeline?
